Toggles the [[weather]]. If weather is currently clear, [[rain]] or [[Snowfall|snow]] starts. If weather is currently rain, snow, or a [[thunderstorm]], it becomes clear. Can be overridden by the {{cmd|weather}} command.

== Syntax ==

: <code>toggledownfall</code>

== Result ==

Always succeeds.
